body: Your blood burns with the passion and unyielding quest for self-improvement displayed so prominently by your human relatives.
name: Human Spirit
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/New Racial Rules/Half-Elven Feats/Human Spirit

sections.body: You receive 1 bonus skill rank. Whenever you gain another Hit Die, you gain an additional skill rank. You cannot gain more than four skill ranks in this way.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: You can only take this feat at 1st level. If you take this feat, you cannot take the Elven Spirit feat.
sections.name: Special
